answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Generalized feeling of a burning sensation and tingling can be due to dry skin, hyperthyroid states, liver or gall bladder dysfunction, peripheral neuropathies as in diabetes or decreased sweating as in Sjogren’s syndrome. This would need a comprehensive investigation. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!
